titleStmt.title: A sermon of predestination preached at Saint Maries in Oxford: by Ri: Crakanthorp.
titleStmt.author: Crakanthorpe, Richard, 1567-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Purslowe] for Iohn Teage, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Golden Ball,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Churchyard, at the signe of the Golden Ball
